title: How a 24-year-old Stanford Ph.D. dropout lured some of Meta's brightest minds to join her AI math startup
description: 24-year-old Axiom Math founder Carina Hong wooed top Meta researchers in a competitive AI talent market.

title: 3 simple, hearty bean recipes from the founder of London's 'it' bean brand, to help cut inflammation and cholesterol
description: High in protein and fiber, beans can help you reach almost any nutritional goal you might have.

title: Just Cause Creator Revs Up With New Action Game Samson
description: In 2020, Just Cause creator and Avalanche Studios founder Christofer Sundberg started a new company, Liquid Swords, alongside other industry veterans. Now, the team at Liquid Swords has shared the first trailer for its debut action title, Samson: A Tyndalston Story. It may remind some fans of Grand Theft Auto, but there are differences that make it a lot harder to earn money in this game.

title: Meet Luana Lopes Lara: The 29-year-old ex-ballerina spent summers working for Ray Dalio and Ken Griffin—now she’s the youngest female self-made billionaire
description: Following in the footsteps of Taylor Swift and Scale AI’s Lucy Guo, Luana Lopes Lara has just been crowned the world’s youngest female self-made billionaire. The millennial founder built an $11 billion startup in just six years.

title: Future of Business: Moderna’s Founder on Innovation That Breaks Through
description: A conversation with the CEO of Flagship Pioneering.

title: Trump commutes 7-year prison sentence for private equity exec convicted in scheme to defraud more than 10,000 investors
description: Gentile had been the CEO and co-founder of GPB Capital, which had raised $1.6 billion in capital to acquire companies in the auto, retail, health care and housing sectors.

title: I'm a 22-year-old university student building an AI startup. The hardest part is losing student life.
description: A 22-year-old cybersecurity student shares what it's like to build an AI startup in university, and why being a young founder can feel lonely.

title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes has had nearly three years knocked off her prison sentence
description: Federal inmates can earn up to 54 days of good-conduct time for each year of their sentence. See how that's impacted Elizabeth Holmes's prison term.

title: Ford workers told their CEO ‘none of the young people want to work here.’ So Jim Farley took a page out of the founder’s playbook
description: Ford founder Henry Ford decided in 1914 to more than double factory workers' wages to $5 a day, jump-starting the American middle class.

title: Ford workers told their CEO ‘none of the young people want to work here.’ So Jim Farley took a page out of the founder’s playbook
description: Ford founder Henry Ford decided in 1914 to more than double factory workers' wages to $5 a day, jump-starting the American middle class.

title: From college dropout to Ironman CEO in 7 years, this Gen Z founder found ‘no pain, no gain’ from a trip to China and the Shaolin monks
description: Gustas Germanavicius, one of Lithuania's top Ironmen at 27 years old, told Fortune about what he learned on his trip to China: "practice makes tired."

title: The world’s top designers are exploring whether the private sector can move the needle on the UN’s SDGs
description: “Every time you design something, you're making an active choice on the future you want to build,” says Ben Sheppard, founder of Design for Good.

title: Founder of $100 million company never unplugs from work, but encourages her team to have work-life balance: ‘They didn’t sign up to be entrepreneurs’
description: Nicole Bernard Dawes, founder of Nixie and $100 million snack brand Late July, says her lack of work-life balance is a “self-inflicted situation,” but she wants her staffers to totally unplug off the clock.

title: A 55-year-old health founder shared 55 reasons he feels his fittest, sharpest, and happiest. 5 tips could add 10 years to your life.
description: Kevin Dahlstrom's tips for healthy aging include walking daily. He told Business Insider health has been a priority since he got sick in his 20s.

title: OpenAI cofounder says scaling compute is not enough to advance AI: 'It's back to the age of research again'
description: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever said during a "Dwarkesh Podcast" that companies need to find a productive way to use the massive amounts of compute.

title: Players Era Championship teams to receive more than $1M on average in NIL compensation
description: Stopping short of saying every participating college basketball team in the Players Era Championship will receive at least $1 million in name, image and likeness money, tournament co-founder Seth Berger said Tuesday the average compensation will be greater than that figure.  “What I can tell you is that actually on average each team is getting over $1 million in guaranteed NIL compensation,” Berger said.

title: Attempted murder, trafficking charges filed against Dauphin County motorcycle club founder
description: DAUPHIN COUNTY, Pa. (WHTM) — A Dauphin County motorcycle club founder faces attempted murder, human trafficking and other charges, according to court documents. Pennsylvania State Police on Tuesday charged 38-year-old Oscar Robinson, of Williamstown, who created The Lost Ones motorcycle club in 2022. He also ran Zero to 100 club’s Harrisburg chapter after helping establish […]

title: Nike Founder Phil Knight Announces Record-Breaking Political Donation
description: Nike founder Phil Knight is known for being heavily involved in Oregon athletics. The billionaire sports brand founder has given a ton of money to Oregon football, track, basketball and other sports. He's not just giving his money to college athletics, though. The 87-year-old founder has made a ...

title: Ex-GTA Boss Dan Houser Thinks AI Is Overrated
description:
Rockstar Games co-founder Dan Houser may have included an advanced AI as a plot in his new novel, A Better Paradise: Volume One - An Aftermath, but he's not as impressed with the current state of the technology. During a recent appearance, Houser didn't completely downplay AI, but he noted that the technology isn't everything some of its proponents have made it out to be.
While making a guest appearance on Channel 4's Sunday Brunch, Houser acknowledged that his upcoming video game based on A Better Paradise may have some AI. But he also warned that the technology behind AI can't live up to its biggest promises yet.
"We are dabbling in using AI, but the truth is a lot of it's not as useful as some of the companies would have you believe yet," said Houser.

title: A 29-year-old VC founder cold-emailed Marc Benioff 53 times to get his attention. It worked.
description: Harry Stebbings emailed Marc Benioff 53 times for a year, trying different techniques. It paid off with a 2023 podcast interview.

title: Byju's founder to appeal U.S. court order to pay over $1B in bankruptcy case
description: A U.S. bankruptcy court has ordered Byju's founder Byju Raveendran to pay over $1.07 billion in a case over missing company funds.

title: BitMine Immersion Sitting on $4B Loss on Ether Bet as Analyst Warns of Structural issues
description: Tom Lee's company could trap shareholders amid low staking yields, hefty embedded fees and vanishing NAV premium, 10x Research founder Markus Thielen warns.

title: Hytale Dev Is Pricing The Game As "Aggressively Low As Possible"
description:
Earlier this year, Hytale was canceled after spending a decade in development and the studio behind it, Hypixel, was slated to be closed as well. Hypixel co-founder Simon Collins-Laflamme subsequently revived the company and purchased all of the rights for Hytale from Riot Games. Collins-Laflamme also reiterated his commitment to releasing Hypixel in early access. Now, we know how much the game is going to cost.
On social media, Hypixel revealed that Hytale will retail for $20.

title: Centerbridge's Aronson Defends Private Credit: 'Take a Breath'
description: Jeff Aronson, Centerbridge Partners co-founder and managing principal, says to call private credit and direct lending "garbage lending" is an overstatement. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Aronson says there are always peaks and valleys in lending. DoubleLine Capital CEO and founder Jeffrey Gundlach called private credit "garbage lending" earlier this week.

title: Jeff Bezos’ most expensive investment is a $500 million custom superyacht that’s the largest in the world
description: The Amazon founder even paid an extra $75 million for another yacht to support his superyacht.
